segments.text: Look at this cozy kitchen moment I'm watching.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's busy drying dishes, all domestic and sweet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I love how the sunlight comes through the window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But wait, the sink's overflowing, that's kind of funny.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's standing right in the puddle without a clue.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the kids are up to mischief with the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's on that wobbly stool, grabbing treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's waiting patiently, hand out like a pro beggar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's adorable how they're teaming up behind mom's back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks perfect, like nothing's wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene just makes me smile at their sneakiness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wouldn't mind joining in on those cookies myself.
segments.speaker: PAR
